REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2164 reute d f BC-DISC-<DSTC.O>-GETS-OR 06-02 0047

TEXT.TITLE: DISC <DSTC.O> GETS ORDER FROM MINISCRIBE<MINY.O>
TEXT.BODY: Disc Technology Corp said it has received 1,500,000 dlrs in orders for hard discs from MiniScribe Corp's MiniScribe Ltd Singapore affiliate. It said the shipments are to be completed by September 30. Reuter
